Turbo Power Semiconductors

Efficient power chips for the energy transition

Turbo Power Semiconductors helps electric vehicle manufacturers get more performance out of their batteries at about one-third the cost of the current solution. Our Silicon-based solution has the performance of Silicon Carbide at a much lower cost.

With its innovative, patent-pending TurboIGBT technology, Turbo Power Semiconductors is strategically focused on advancing IGBT technology to meet the growing demands of this dynamic sector.

With our TurboIGBT, Tesla could save about $1,300 per car.

Founder and President

Alex Huang

Has been working on power semiconductors and power electronics for more than 40 years. Most in academic R&D settings. Inventors of many power chip concepts. First IGBT in China etc.

For more info send us a message at
